adjective.definition: Quick to understand, learn, and devise or apply ideas; intelligent.
adjective.example: She is a clever student who learns quickly.

adjective.definition: Skilled at doing or achieving something; talented.
adjective.example: He is clever with his hands.

noun.definition: The quality of being clever; intelligence or ingenuity.
noun.example: Her cleverness helped her solve the puzzle.

verb.example: He tried to clever up his appearance.

usage_examples: It was a clever plan to get us out of trouble.
You are very clever to solve that puzzle.
